mapper.insert: insert into task (task_id, qa_type, qa_eid, inspector_one, inspector_two, start_time, end_time) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qaEid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectorOne,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectorTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update task
qa_type = #{qaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qa_eid = #{qaEid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

inspector_two = #{inspectorTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
